channel.title: Wolf Mountains Radio
channel.itunes:subtitle: Free Format podcast from the UK
channel.itunes:author: Wolf Mountains

item.title: Wolf Mountains 73 - January 2011
item.description: Featuring the best in new Americana, alt country, roots tracks and much more. This month, tracks from Gerry Rafferty, Kevin Connolly, Lotte Mullan, Lucinda Williams, Drive-By Truckers, Massy Ferguson, The Molenes, Uncle Lucius, Dylan Sneed, Dave Alvin, Great Lakes, Crosby, Stills & Nash, Gram Parsons, Shawn Colvin, Eilidh Patterson, Ryan Bingham, Matthew & The Atlas, Miriam Jones, Bow Thayer & Perfect Trainwreck and Steely Dan You can e-mail the program at wolfmountains@gmail.com. The program can also be streamed at www.myspace.com/wolfmountains where you'll be able to see the playlists of all the podcasts to date. We are also on Facebook at www.facebook.com/wolfmountains. Feel free to add us as a 'friend'. *Please note, that if you are picking up the podcast from a third-party website, that only the current podcast is stored and that previous podcasts have been deleted. Each podcast stays up until the following month's has been recorded (usually by the first weekend of every month)
item.dc:creator: Wolf Mountains
item.itunes:summary:
Featuring the best in new Americana, alt country, roots tracks and much more. This month, tracks from Gerry Rafferty, Kevin Connolly, Lotte Mullan, Lucinda Williams, Drive-By Truckers, Massy Ferguson, The Molenes, Uncle Lucius, Dylan Sneed, Dave Alvin, Great Lakes, Crosby, Stills & Nash, Gram Parsons, Shawn Colvin, Eilidh Patterson, Ryan Bingham, Matthew & The Atlas, Miriam Jones, Bow Thayer & Perfect Trainwreck and Steely Dan
You can e-mail the program at wolfmountains@gmail.com. The program can also be streamed at www.myspace.com/wolfmountains where you'll be able to see the playlists of all the podcasts to date.
We are also on Facebook at www.facebook.com/wolfmountains. Feel free to add us as a 'friend'. *Please note, that if you are picking up the podcast from a third-party website, that only the current podcast is stored and that previous podcasts have been deleted. Each podcast stays up until the following month's has been recorded (usually by the first weekend of every month)
